events.title: Annual Alumni Gala 2024
events.description: Join us for an elegant evening celebrating our alumni achievements, networking opportunities, and fundraising for student scholarships. Dress code: Black tie optional.

events.title: Tech Innovation Summit
events.description: Explore the latest trends in technology with leading alumni in the tech industry. Panel discussions, workshops, and networking sessions included.

events.title: Young Alumni Mixer
events.description: Casual networking event for recent graduates (2019-2024). Connect with peers, share experiences, and build lasting professional relationships.

events.title: Leadership Workshop Series
events.description: Three-part workshop series focusing on executive leadership skills, change management, and strategic thinking. Led by senior alumni executives.

events.title: Healthcare Alumni Reunion
events.description: Special reunion for alumni working in healthcare and medical fields. Share experiences from the pandemic and discuss future healthcare innovations.

events.title: Homecoming Weekend Celebration
events.description: Join us for the annual homecoming festivities! Campus tours, game viewing party, and class reunion gatherings throughout the weekend.

events.title: Entrepreneur Meetup & Pitch Night
events.description: Monthly meetup for alumni entrepreneurs and those interested in starting their own business. Features startup pitches and mentorship opportunities.

events.title: Women in Leadership Forum
events.description: Empowering women alumni through leadership discussions, mentorship connections, and professional development opportunities.

events.title: Class of 2014 Ten Year Reunion
events.description: Celebrating a decade since graduation! Reconnect with classmates, tour campus updates, and share your post-graduation journey.

events.title: Summer Alumni Golf Tournament
events.description: Annual charity golf tournament to raise funds for student scholarships. Includes breakfast, 18 holes, cart, and awards dinner.
